title: Doubt about breaking wudu during prayer, realized AFTER that I broke wudu, what to do? assimalhakeem
transcript: sah from India my question is what to do when I am not certain that I broke voodo in Salah and after prayer realizing that I broke W if you realized that you broke your woodoo after the Salah was over you pray to pray it again you have to go and make wo and then pray it over again but if you broke your woodoo during the Salat and you discovered that you should leave the Salat immediately make woo and join it back again
